title: Counting
description: Learn how to count from one to ten in Balinese
explanation: Knowing how to count up to ten in Balinese will make you able to tell how many stuff you need to local comfortably.

title: Self Introduction
description: Learn how to start a conversation and introducing yourself to others
explanation: **Om Swastiastu** is a word that can be used in many situation. Literally it means good wishes for the other party. Usually it's used as a greeting in a polite manner. You will learn how it's used during self introduction in the upcoming conversation.

title: Pointing at Something
description: Learn how to point at something that is near or far away from you
explanation: **Nika** and **Niki** are used not only to point at something but also used to emphasize or stress a sentence meaning
